website_summaries.verdict: All things considered, the OCZ ARC 100 series is an excellent upgrade to a sluggish computer, thanks to good performance and affordable pricing.
pros: The OCZ ARC 100 series is the most affordable solid-state drive on the market
The drive has good performance and supports encryption
cons: The new SSD doesn't come with any accessories or software, it has a short three-year warranty, and its performance ranks behind that of other recently released drives

customer_reviews.title: I've gone SSD!  Not looking back.
customer_reviews.text: I'm done with mechanical hard drives. The old saying "they don't make them like they use to" is very true here. I have old drives that worked for 10 years until they were taken out of service because of their limited capacity. In the last few years I have had 4 1TB and 500GB drives fail within the warranty period. The last time was the last straw. This is my 3rd SSD drive for 3 different computers. So far they have preformed GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Righteous

customer_reviews.title: Inexplicably stopped functioning early in life
customer_reviews.text: For quite a while not has not been working up as a bootup drive. Have spent about a year trying to get it reformatted to try to reinstall the OS, and it fails every time. Worked pretty shoddily from the start, but took about a year for it to stop working entirely. Never been the case with other SSD's I've owned for as long or even much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gaykwon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BRAND OF SSD!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! I've installed several hundred SSDs over the years, and the ONLY ones to die are OCZs. This latest one from May died in less than a month. Strongly recommend you avoid these!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! My PC boots in less time then ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! My PC boots in less time then it takes me to put in my password (needless to say I don't use all my fingers). It installed with a few minor problems After I read the users installation blurb smooth sailing AND I AM TICKLED! I am going to to get one for "Papa Bear" Too.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD with great $/GB
customer_reviews.text: Great drive with a fantastic warranty service. OCZ is really stepping up these days to build their rep back. I upgraded a laptop with this from a slow 5400RPM drive. I see regular 450MB/s read and write speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrewings

customer_reviews.title: Fast Startup in Windows 7 Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a 250gb SSD drive from Samsung on this computer. The drive got to be too full and I installed this drive using a System Image in Windows 7. The only issue was the drive was created with 2 partitions instead of 1. I was able to "extend the drive to create a partition that used the entire 480gb. Updated- The drive since failed. Lasted 12 months and would not boot up. Looking into sending in for a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mideke

customer_reviews.title: So far this SSD has performed exceptionally well. Was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this SSD has performed exceptionally well. Was the least of my problems attempting to upgrade on of my old computers. It helped increase the overall speed substantially.
customer_reviews.author: Swifty

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and size currently.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I couldn't pass it up. Huge speed boost compared to my sata hd. I have a amd fx9370 8 core watercooled with 16gb ddr3. I was disappointed at the guy who built it for putting in a regular hd. Put this in, things are quicker loading esp boot. I keep 2 one for os and one for programs. Would recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great drive for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly as expected, its huge storage and low cost. Not as fast as some other drives but in a real world application you don't need anything faster than this.
customer_reviews.author: rgehres

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD drive at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: great drives, I use these whenever I switch to SSD for my customers. Can't beat the price for SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pesanka

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: CrystalDisk has this SSD reading and writing on par with my Crucial MX100. I am very satisfied I think there was a price glitch when I got this, came out to $120.00 for the 480GB version. Even though it was an obvious pricing error, they still honored it even though I told them I'd be glad to pay the difference. A+ for the ssd and customer service
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Honestly amazed this drive is so good
customer_reviews.text: Honestly amazed this drive is so good. I was using a 240gb Samsung 840 EVO pro and this drive is almost as fast and has much more storage. In fact its so good I believe I will buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: My First SSD
customer_reviews.text: Great drive, installed with zero issues. My Win7 x64 Pro loads in about 5 seconds after POST is done. Lots of space for a low price. My case already had a quick slot caddy just this size, so install was a breeze. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for their first SSD like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler David Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product so far
customer_reviews.text: Had it now for around 2 months. Works like a charm. Is very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This item performs exactly as I expected. Easy to install and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Graves

customer_reviews.title: I bought it on black friday 2015 with nice price in amazon.com(foreigner review)
customer_reviews.text: i have z170 motherboard, i5-6400 cpu, 8g memory computer. and try benchmark program. It's my First SSD drive. nice speed!! I bought it on black friday 2015 with nice price in amazon.com I try benchmark in el capitan on 2016
customer_reviews.author: NeView

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 weeks then kept crashing over and over. Waste of time, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: SSD drives - a hit or miss piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these SSD's one went bad in about a week or so AFTER I got everything installed and updated. So I returned it to Amazon. I got the 2nd one...this one went bad in about 2 days...again AFTER I got most of the updates installed. I still need to return this 2nd one...the 1st one has been running for about 2 weeks now...still running but I'm going to clone it to the 2nd one AFTER I return that one too.
customer_reviews.author: NormB

customer_reviews.title: Drive lasted < 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Drive failed in less than 2 months. And folks, when an SSD fails, there is no recovery. It's now just an expensive hockey puck.
customer_reviews.author: Master of None

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many ocz ssd's but this on died less than 2 months and amazon says it is not returnable so I am stuck with junk
customer_reviews.author: Soulreaper8402

customer_reviews.title: Drive failed on me and I got no support from OCZ
customer_reviews.text: I reached out to the manufacturer OCZ and the did not stand behind their product. "Kioxia Corporate Office will not approve RMA for this OCZ ARC100" Good thing I had a raid back up setup on my computer or else all my information would have been lost. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: 4 Years 10 Months Dead
customer_reviews.text: Died at 4 years 10 months; deader than a doornail with no warning. Too bad they can't design a limp home mode. Backup your data!
customer_reviews.author: JSU

customer_reviews.title: Great RMA process if you get a DOA
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these from the local Fry's and it died a day later, so I filled out the OCZ RMA web form before driving 30 minutes to do an exchange. To my surprise with no additional questions or hoops to jump through they sent me a brand new one by second day air mail with a prepaid return label in the box top send the dead one back to them. I will definitely consider OCZ products in the future for the steller customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Glamdring

customer_reviews.title: Only had this SSD installed on my gaming computer for ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had this SSD installed on my gaming computer for 2 years before it got corrupted. For the price look at Samsung Evo line instead. save yourself the headache
customer_reviews.author: scott tyson

product_meta.title: OCZ Storage Solutions Arc 100 Series 480GB 2.5-Inch 7mm SATA III Ultra-Slim Solid State Drive with Toshiba A19nm NAND ARC100-25SAT3-480G
product_meta.description:
MODEL

DETAILS

PERFORMANCE

FEATURES

ENVIRONMENTAL

DIMENSIONS & WEIGHT
feature_bullets: Cutting-edge A19nm process geometry NAND offers excellent value for consumer desktops and laptops
Emphasis on endurance, rated for 20GB/day of host writes for 3 years (typical client workloads)
Proprietary Barefoot 3 M10 controller technology delivers superior sustained speeds over the long term
Excels in both incompressible and compressible data types such as multimedia, encrypted data,. ZIP files and software

Advanced suite of NAND flash management to analyze and dynamically adapt as flash cells wear Max Sequential Read Speed 490MB/s; Max Sequential Write Speed 450MB/s; Up to 80K IOPS Sleek alloy housing offers ultra-slim sub-7mm z-height for use in the

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
